channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road Bollard's outside the corner pin pub on Slade Green Road, 20th October
item.description:
Road Bollard's outside the corner pin pub on Slade Green Road have not been there for over a month, as they were stolen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slade Green Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White car blocking 2 Doctors Bays, 20th October
item.description:
A car is parked over two Doctors Parking bays preventing " gps from parking this made them late to see patients and had to find parking else where patients were very sick and surgery was delayed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Elgin Avenue, Maida Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Defective street lamp C1001, 20th October
item.description:
The light column C1001 directly outside 1 Caygill Close has a large number of defective LED and as a result emits poor lighting and also only comes on well after dark so needs adjusting accordingly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Caygill Close, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
